title: One Military Camp
description:
An evil maniac has conquered all territories in the region, except one. The world’s last hope resides in an old military camp located in this peaceful land. Bring it back to its former glory, to recruit and train a brave group of fighters to push back the evil forces . OCTOPATH TRAVELER II
Face the challenge of building a military camp, keeping an eye on the resources and logistics. Place the buildings efficiently, hire the staff that will keep everything running and set up the training courses.
Build defenses, because the enemy will send spies and drones to try to sabotage your camp. Not only will you have to manage your recruits ‘ training and your economy, but also their schedules, because this military camp doesn’t rest Take care of the maintenance of the buildings and the well-being of your rookies don’t let them get injured! Adapt to different biomes and research hundreds of technologies and upgrades for your camp.
